## GetHistoryParams.minimalResponse property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

only return last_changed and last_updated attributes for states other than the first and last state in the period (much faster)

**Signature:**

```typescript
minimalResponse?: boolean;
```
